text: Geills Turner (n√©e Kilgour; born December 23, 1937) is a Canadian businesswoman and socialite. She was the wife of John Turner, the 17th Prime Minister of Canada. Between June 1984 to September 1984, Turner was the Spouse of the Prime Minister of Canada. Turner was born in Winnipeg, Manitoba. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian businesspeople Category:People from Winnipeg Category:Spouses of Prime Ministers of Canada
title: Geills Turner
